body: Does anybody know how to download shaders for labymod?
body_tagged: Does anybody know how to download shaders for labymod?
title: LabyMod with shaders

replies.body:
LabyMod's site is down right now so I can't check, but if you can get a recent version of Optifine, odds are it will work.

The recent versions of Optifine have the shader mod integrated in to them.
